item_16_analysis.title: Restrictions on What You May Sell

main_points.point: Franchisees must operate in conformity with franchisor standards and specifications to maintain system uniformity.
Only approved products and services, or those meeting franchisor standards, may be offered and sold.
Franchisees are required to offer all designated handyman, repair, and maintenance services within their market area.
Franchisees must offer, honor, and comply with terms of any established subscription package programs.
Franchisees are responsible for obtaining all necessary licenses and permits.
Franchisees cannot engage in activities not covered by liability or workers compensation insurance.
Franchisees cannot engage in activities harmful to goodwill, reflecting unfavorably on reputation, constituting deceptive/unfair competition, or violating applicable law.
Certain inventory, supplies, and equipment must be purchased from the franchisor or an approved vendor.
There is a purchasing arrangement with Ace Hardware requiring purchase of materials, supplies, and goods from an Ace Supplier when in stock, readily available, and competitively priced.
Other items can be purchased from local hardware stores, big box outlets, and other sources.
The franchisor may impose restrictions limiting access to customers outside of the Territory and to commercial customers within the Territory, as discussed in ITEM 12.

requirements: Operate in conformity with franchisor standards and specifications.
Offer and sell only approved products and services or those meeting franchisor standards.
Offer all designated required services within the market area.
Offer, honor, and comply with subscription package programs.
Promptly obtain all necessary licenses and permits.
Purchase certain inventory, supplies, and equipment from the franchisor or an approved vendor.
Purchase materials, supplies, and goods from an Ace Supplier under specific conditions.
Not engage in activities not covered by insurance.
Not engage in activities harmful to goodwill, reputation, or that violate law.
obligations: Source specific items from approved channels.
important_details: The Operations Manual or other writings may specify standards and specifications.
The franchisor may change required services with prior notice.
The purchasing arrangement with Ace Hardware is conditional on items being in stock, readily available, and competitively priced.
The franchisor reserves the right to terminate or modify the Franchisee Advisory Council.
Restrictions on customer access are limited to those discussed in ITEM 12.
